attributes.action: Give the OLYMPIC Council TAX Charges BACK to EVERYONE who paid it
attributes.additional_details:
Ive just been reading that the goverment has effectively sold to private investors for 588 million the olympic village. We have paid extra in our council tax in London Bourough`s to pay for the Olympic`s with an "olympic levy" on our COUNCIL TAX bills...and now your selling what we paid for and keeping the money! its daylight robbery!  Londoners pay for it..and we dont even get a free ticket!!

Give us our money back once you`ve sold it!!
